courses.name: Web Development Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of web development including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
courses.agenda: Introduction to HTML, CSS fundamentals, JavaScript basics
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Build static web pages, style websites with CSS, add interactivity with JavaScript

courses.name: Introduction to Python Programming
courses.description: Get started with Python programming language and learn the fundamentals.
courses.agenda: Python syntax, variables, data types, control flow
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Write Python programs, work with data structures, automate tasks

courses.name: Mobile App Development with React Native
courses.description: Build mobile applications using React Native framework.
courses.agenda: React Native fundamentals, UI components, navigation
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Develop cross-platform mobile apps, integrate APIs, deploy to app stores

courses.name: Data Science and Machine Learning
courses.description: Explore the field of data science and machine learning techniques.
courses.agenda: Data analysis, machine learning algorithms, model evaluation
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Perform data analysis, build predictive models, extract insights

courses.name: Full Stack Web Development
courses.description: Become a full stack web developer with hands-on experience in front-end and back-end technologies.
courses.agenda: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Develop full-fledged web applications, build RESTful APIs, work with databases

courses.name: Java Programming
courses.description: Learn the Java programming language and object-oriented programming concepts.
courses.agenda: Java syntax, classes and objects, inheritance, polymorphism
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Write Java programs, build object-oriented applications

courses.name: Front-End Web Development with Angular
courses.description: Master the Angular framework for building modern web applications.
courses.agenda: Angular fundamentals, components, services, routing
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Build dynamic web apps, handle data with observables, implement SPA architecture

courses.name: Android App Development
courses.description: Learn to develop Android applications using Java and Android Studio.
courses.agenda: Java for Android, UI design, app components
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Create Android apps, utilize device features, publish to the Play Store

courses.name: Cloud Computing with AWS
courses.description: Explore the services offered by Amazon Web Services (AWS) and learn to deploy applications on the cloud.
courses.agenda: AWS basics, EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Deploy applications on AWS, work with cloud services, scale resources

courses.name: Data Structures and Algorithms
courses.description: Master the fundamental data structures and algorithms used in programming.
courses.agenda: Arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, sorting algorithms
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Implement data structures, analyze algorithm efficiency

courses.name: React.js Development
courses.description: Learn to build interactive web interfaces using the React.js library.
courses.agenda: React components, state management, React Router
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Create reusable UI components, manage application state, handle routing

courses.name: iOS App Development with Swift
courses.description: Build iOS applications using the Swift programming language and Xcode.
courses.agenda: Swift basics, UI design, app development
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Develop iOS apps, utilize iOS frameworks, publish to the App Store

courses.name: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of cybersecurity and essential techniques to secure computer systems.
courses.agenda: Network security, cryptography, secure coding practices
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Identify common security vulnerabilities, implement secure practices

courses.name: UI/UX Design
courses.description: Master the principles of user interface and user experience design.
courses.agenda: Design thinking, wireframing, prototyping
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Create user-centered designs, conduct usability testing

courses.name: Advanced JavaScript Concepts
courses.description: Deep dive into advanced JavaScript concepts and modern JavaScript features.
courses.agenda: Closures, async programming, ES6+ features
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Write more efficient JavaScript code, utilize advanced features

courses.name: Software Testing and Quality Assurance
courses.description: Learn the principles of software testing and quality assurance techniques.
courses.agenda: Testing methodologies, test planning, test automation
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Design test cases, execute test plans, automate tests

courses.name: Blockchain Fundamentals
courses.description: Explore the fundamentals of blockchain technology and its applications.
courses.agenda: Blockchain basics, smart contracts, decentralized applications
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Understand blockchain principles, develop blockchain applications

courses.name: WordPress Development
courses.description: Learn to build websites using the WordPress content management system.
courses.agenda: WordPress installation, theme development, plugin customization
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Create dynamic websites with WordPress, customize themes and plugins

courses.name: Artificial Intelligence Fundamentals
courses.description: Get an introduction to artificial intelligence and its various applications.
courses.agenda: AI concepts, machine learning, natural language processing
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Understand AI principles, apply AI techniques to real-world problems

courses.name: Digital Marketing
courses.description: Learn the strategies and techniques for effective digital marketing campaigns.
courses.agenda: SEO, social media marketing, email marketing
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Plan and execute digital marketing campaigns, analyze marketing data

courses.name: Network Security and Ethical Hacking
courses.description: Explore the field of network security and ethical hacking techniques.
courses.agenda: Network protocols, vulnerability assessment, penetration testing
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Identify network security vulnerabilities, perform ethical hacking

courses.name: Big Data Analytics
courses.description: Learn to analyze and extract insights from large volumes of data.
courses.agenda: Data processing, data visualization, machine learning on big data
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Apply big data analytics techniques, work with distributed systems

courses.name: UI Design with Figma
courses.description: Master the Figma design tool for creating stunning user interfaces.
courses.agenda: Figma interface, design components, collaboration
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Create high-fidelity UI designs, collaborate with design teams

courses.name: Cloud Native Application Development
courses.description: Learn to develop applications using cloud-native technologies and architectures.
courses.agenda: Microservices, containers, serverless computing
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Design and build cloud-native applications, utilize cloud services

courses.name: Game Development with Unity
courses.description: Build interactive games using the Unity game development engine.
courses.agenda: Unity basics, game mechanics, physics simulation
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Develop 2D and 3D games, implement game features and mechanics

courses.name: Database Management Systems
courses.description: Learn the concepts and principles of database management systems.
courses.agenda: Relational databases, SQL queries, database design
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Manage and query databases, design efficient database schemas

courses.name: DevOps Fundamentals
courses.description: Explore the principles and practices of DevOps for efficient software development and deployment.
courses.agenda: Continuous integration, continuous deployment, infrastructure automation
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Implement DevOps practices, automate software delivery processes

courses.name: JavaScript Frameworks: Vue.js
courses.description: Learn to build web applications using the Vue.js framework.
courses.agenda: Vue.js fundamentals, components, state management
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Develop dynamic web applications, handle application state with Vuex

courses.name: Data Visualization with D3.js
courses.description: Master the D3.js library for creating interactive and dynamic data visualizations.
courses.agenda: D3.js basics, data binding, SVG manipulation
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Create custom data visualizations, handle data updates and interactions

courses.name: Internet of Things (IoT) Fundamentals
courses.description: Get an introduction to the Internet of Things (IoT) and its applications.
courses.agenda: IoT concepts, sensors and actuators, data analytics
courses.whatYouWillLearn: Understand IoT principles, develop IoT applications
